name: test_prometheus_metrics
description:
arrange: given a prometheus charm application.
    act: when GitHub runner is integrated.
    assert: the datasource is registered and basic metrics are available.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: given a prometheus charm application.
act: when GitHub runner is integrated.
assert: the datasource is registered and basic metrics are available.
